title: Anyone else getting a sudden spike in firewall errors?
body:
The past ~4-5 days I've been getting firewall errors daily, (The last time I had this was way back around like 4.3 or so) and it's really starting to bug me. I've screwed around with my settings a lot, but I don't really have much computer knowledge, so I dunno what I'm really looking for. 

Anyone able to help me? This issue has already dropped a low priority queue on me, and I'd really like to avoid it happening again. {{item:3070}}

replies.body: I cannot even start the game, I tried every possible solution.

its in the mega bug thread. 5.1 messed crap up again.

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/UWunwEot-patch-51-bugs-megathread
I had the exact same problem. But I reinstalled league and didn't have a problem again
I've been getting bugsplat, but at least i can reconnect once that does happen, firewalls are the worst
